problem.markdown:
>>What percent of water on earth is freshwater?<< () less than 1% (x) 1–5% () 5–10% () 20-30% () 50-60%
[explanation] Only 2.8% of water on Earth is fresh water, while 97.2% of water is found in the oceans. [explanation]
problem.p: What percent of water on earth is freshwater?

choicegroup.label: What percent of water on earth is freshwater?

div.p: Only 2.8% of water on Earth is fresh water, while 97.2% of water is found in the oceans.
